actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor

actions.text: House Committee on Education and Labor Discharged by Suspension of Rules.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and held at the desk until the close of business September 23, 1982.
Ordered held at desk until close of business September 24, 1982.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to amend the Community Services Block Grant Act to clarify the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services to designate community action agencies for certain community action programs administered by the Secretary for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Community Services Block Grant Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to designate a replacement agency for a community action agency terminated or denied funding by the Secretary during FY 1982. States that such designated replacement agency shall receive community services block grant funds through FY 1983. Permits reinstatement of a replaced agency if a final determination to restore funding is made before the State begins operating programs with the designated new agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Community Services Block Grant Act to clarify the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services to designate community action agencies for certain community action programs administered by the Secretary for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.
